title: Avani Dead Sea Mineral Therapy Mud
description:
This nutrient & mineral rich Dead Sea Mud mask contains active ingredients that condition & firm your skin while the gentle but effective natural cleansing properties will purifying your skin leaving it radiant & refreshed.

Directions: Apply generously to entire body. Leave on for 10-15 minutes. Rinse thoroughly.

title: AVANI Timeless Mineral Eye Cream For all skin types 50 ml / 1.7 fl.oz.
description:
Enriched with natural plant extracts, vitamin E and collagen, this lightly textured eye cream has been formulated by combining the pure, rejuvenating minerals of the Dead Sea with a blend of plant extracts, essential oils, collagen & vitamin E.

Size: 1.7 Fl. Oz. / 50 ml.
Made in Israel.

This choice, natural ingredients are renowned for their anti-aging, anti oxidant and moisturizing qualities and when regularly applied to the delicate skin around the eye, these active ingredients help to reduce the appearance of fine lines, wrinkles and puffiness to promote a fresher, more youthful glow.

Directions: Apply to the eye area, gently tapping it with tour fingertips until absorbed.

title: Avani Refreshing Facial Toner All Skin Types 220ml 7.5oz.
description: With its rich blend of over eight natural plant extracts & essential oils that are known for their soothing & moisturizing properties, this gentle vitamin enriched Facial Toner will effectively remove all traces of make-up, dirt and other impurities without damaging the skins natural pH level.  Containing active ingredients that will minimize excess oils and refine pores to leave skin completely toned, clean and refreshed.
